prompt: A hard-hitting trap beat with a deep booming 808 bass and a crisp layered snare. The hi-hats burst into rapid triplet rolls and stuttering patterns, creating a bouncy, head-nodding feel. A dark moody synth lead floats over the top with an ominous atmosphere. Aggressive and energetic. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Rhythm: include prominent triplet hi-hat rolls and stutters (same tempo/key)
